name: "The Dresden Files" - "Bad Blood" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What type of mystic creature was Bianca?
questions.explanation:
Vampire.

	She hired Dresden to find out who was trying to kill her. She was touted as the most beautiful vampire in all of Chicago. She was played by Joanne Kelly.

questions.text: Prior to Bianca hiring Harry, did they know each other?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	They had a past that was slowly revealed over the course of the episode. She demanded he help her "because of what she'd done for him" in the past. He claimed to not trust her. In the end he chose to help her anyway, despite Bob telling him that she would kill him.

questions.text: What did Bianca do for the a living?
questions.explanation:
Nightclub owner.

	When Harry was still deciding to take her case or not, she promised that she had a witness. She invited him back to her club to see for himself. When he got there, she gave him the eyeball of her witness. Harry used magic to look through the eye and see the scene as it had played when when Bianca was attacked.

questions.text: Where did the Warden meet with the other representatives from the High Council?
questions.explanation:
At a private restaurant.

	Donald Morgan was the Warden of the High Council assigned to Chicago. He met with his underlings once a week at a private restaurant. That's where Harry met up with him to discuss the attack on Bianca.

questions.correct: A drug for the magical community
questions.explanation:
A drug for the magical community.

	It was a designer drug that was made for people in the magical community. Bianca called it a "degenerate's drug", while Harry hadn't previously heard of it.  The High Council thought Bianca was involved in dealing it.

questions.text: Why did Jake and Bianca sever their business ties?
questions.explanation:
He was a drug dealer.

	He wanted to sell drugs at Bianca's club, she wanted to stay clean. She paid him to go away, but three years later he returned to Chicago. He was a red herring for the attempted murderer. The actual person behind the plot was Bianca's new business partner Natalie.

Clive.

	Clive was a retired mercenary and vampire hunter. He was killed by other mercenaries hired to follow Harry Dresden. The warehouse where Clive was killed also served as the location of the showdown between Bianca, Natalie and Harry.

questions.text: When Harry first met Natalie he said she was too young to remember which show?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Wizard

	Natalie appeared to be in her mid 20s, but she told him she was 57 years old. She had stopped aging when she became a vampire. The exchange began when she called him "Mr. Wizard".

questions.text: Harry and Bianca became friends and lovers at the end of the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Bianca, just before leaving, told him that she might have to rip his throat out someday. This was while they were enjoying a glass of red wine together.

questions.text: Which series regular didn't appear in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Lt. Murphy

	She was in the opening credits, but not in the episode at all. She appeared in all other 11 episodes of the series. She was portrayed by Valerie Cruz.
